rows.label: bf08140120_0030
rows.name:
Hana think...this world achieved very big
technological advancement.

rows.label: bf08140120_0040
rows.name: Lots of buildings, lots of people everywhere.

rows.label: bf08140120_0050
rows.name: Everyone must have been so happy here.

rows.label: bf08140120_0070
rows.name:
No matter how advanced their technology became,
people's true nature never changes.

rows.label: bf08140120_0080
rows.name:
The technology that was meant to improve their 
lives ended up destroying everything.

rows.label: bf08140120_0100
rows.name: Hana was made by technology too!

rows.label: bf08140120_0150
rows.name:
...then I, created by [System:Ruby rt=Father ]God[/System:Ruby]
might be just as dangerous.

rows.label: bf08140120_0160
rows.name: Are Hana and Hikari the same then?

rows.label: bf08140120_0180
rows.name:
Then...
If Hana ever tried to destroy the world...

rows.label: bf08140120_0190
rows.name: If Hana might hurt Masterpon too...

rows.label: bf08140120_0200
rows.name:
Would you stop Hana? 
Even if it means destroying me?

rows.label: bf08140120_0220
rows.name:
Tora-kun created you. You could never do something 
like that. I know it!

rows.label: bf08140120_0280
rows.name: If you really were about to destroy the world

rows.label: bf08140120_0300
rows.name:
But in return, 
I want you to do something for me too.

rows.label: bf08140120_0320
rows.name: Is Hikari afraid of destroying things too?

rows.label: bf08140120_0330
rows.name:
Well, I'm doing to my best to stop it coming to that.
It's something else...

rows.label: bf08140120_0370
rows.name: I don't have a wish right now.

rows.label: bf08140120_0380
rows.name: Is it okay if I decide later?

rows.label: bf08140120_0400
rows.name: It's a promise between the two of us.

rows.label: bf08140120_0420
rows.name:
This is the Nopon promise ritual
Masterpon taught Hana!

rows.label: bf08140120_0430
rows.name:
You raise your hands up 
high and then clap them together!
